poem:
By the Stream  

In the stream of life,  
flickering shadows of laughter.  
City murmurs blend—  
a pastoral refrain,  
quietly weaving stories.  
The gentle brush of time,  
as echoes of learning  
find their way in  
breath's soft motion.  
Korea's tale unfolds,  
unseen patterns  
on the urban tapestry.
